wikipedia_page.main: Joseph A. Sparks (30 September 1901 – 12 January 1981) was a British trade unionist and Labour Party politician.

response: Holland was an unsuccessful candidate at the 1955 general election in the Birmingham Yardley constituency.  At the next general election, in 1959, he was elected to the House of Commons as Member of Parliament (MP) for the marginal constituency of Acton in west London, narrowly defeating the sitting Labour MP Joseph Sparks. He lost the seat to Bernard Floud at the 1964 election.
* Joseph Sparks (1901–1981), British trade unionist and politician
